channel.title: hugo on renyddd blog site
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on renyddd blog site

item.title: Errors With Hugo
item.description: 开始使用 一篇新的博客 cd WOWRKDIR hugo new posts/gdb-use.md 一些错误记录 1 部署后未收录文章 仔细阅读官方文档 Drafts do not get deployed; once you finish a post, update the header of the post to say draft: false. More info here. 2 选择发布分支 github 端
